mapper.insert: insert into billinginfo (BillingId, InvoiceId, BillingAddress, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingCountry, BillingPostalCode) values (#{billingid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billingaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingpostalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update billinginfo set InvoiceId = #{invoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BillingAddress = #{billingaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingCity = #{billingcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingState = #{billingstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingCountry = #{billingcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingPostalCode = #{billingpostalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BillingId = #{billingid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select BillingId, InvoiceId, BillingAddress, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingCountry, BillingPostalCode from billinginfo where BillingId = #{billingid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select BillingId, InvoiceId, BillingAddress, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingCountry, BillingPostalCode from billinginfo
